name: Pages
description:
This chapter explains all the additional pages that has to offer. Instead of using the pages provided by patchouli, has its own set of pages that can be used in your books. These offer additional functionality and customization options. Here are a few examples:
  • auto scaling for titles, so they won't render outside the page.
  • improved debug information about pages when advanded item tooltips are enabled
    You can also easily adapt my pages as they function with the default values of the Patchouli pages. All you need to do is append a '+' to the page type you want to use.
